title: 打开minecraft以后，出现了这个玩意！坐等解决方案
author: wangyiben
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
This error has been saved to /Users/v/Library/Application Support/minecraft/crash-reports/crash-2012-09-02_15.58.45-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

怎么搞麻～～～

replies.author: qq1575550349
replies.txt_content: 需要下载驱动精灵？还是MOD安装错误呀？

replies.author: wangyiben
replies.txt_content:
qq1575550349 发表于 2012-9-2 18:44 
需要下载驱动精灵？还是MOD安装错误呀？
我就没有装mod啊～～驱动精灵又是怎么回事麻～～

replies.author: 小影
replies.txt_content: 楼主你好~如果进不去的话，你可以进登录器的时候点击设置，再把内存改成512，不行的话就是JAVA的问题哦~（望采纳）
